The speed of the bullet relative to the ground is $v_{0}$.
The speed of cart A is $v_{1}$.
The relative speed of the bullet with respect to cart A is $v_{0} - v_{1}$.
The relative speed of the bullet with respect to cart B is $v_{0} + v_{1}$.
The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is $s$.
The time interval between two adjacent bullets is $\Delta t_{0}$.
The distance traveled by the bullet in the time interval $\Delta t_{0}$ is $(v_{0} + v_{1}) \Delta t_{0}$.
